title: Gross domestic product ( GDP ) per capita in Turkey 2024
yAxis: GDP per capita in U.S. dollars
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes GDP per capita in U.S. dollars. In total the number of data points it has is 41.
Overall GDP per capita in U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2008 and 2009.
The highest GDP per capita in U.S. dollars, of value 12489.9 was reached at Year 2024
The lowest GDP per capita in U.S. dollars, of value 1667.26 was reported at Year 1984
